extensionName.message: Open link in selected Private window

extensionDescription.message: New context menu entry for links which allows choosing a private window in which the link should be opened.

openLinkInNewPrivateWindow.message: Open Link in New Private Window

includeNormalWindows.message: Include normal windows in the list

unnestSingleWindow.message: Don't nest single window in context menu

excludeCurrentWindow.message: Exclude current window from context menu

allowIncognito.message: â†‘ Allow the add-on to work in private mode, so it can manage and list private windows. Click the "Details" tab and select the "Allow" next to "Run in Private Windows".

allowToRunInPrivateMode.message: Allow to run in private mode
